channel.title: My RuneScape account
channel.description:
Had this account for 4 years.
It has RuneScape classic also.
I'm level 9 on RSC =D
131 on RS2
282 Quest Points...
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2qs43yw.jpg[/img]

item.title: My RuneScape account
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote="ExiledScape, post:3, topic:277765"][quote author=Rich link=topic=366646.msg2779038#msg2779038 date=1241666295]
What’s the point of hiding stats? Also there’s a sticky for this.
[/quote]

Cause jagex could search my stats and ban my account for copyright… It’s been done before to a friend of mine.[/quote]

I somehow doubt jagex troll forums like this just to ban people who post…

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape account
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

[quote="ExiledScape, post:3, topic:277765"][quote author=Rich link=topic=366646.msg2779038#msg2779038 date=1241666295]
What’s the point of hiding stats? Also there’s a sticky for this.
[/quote]

Cause jagex could search my stats and ban my account for copyright… It’s been done before to a friend of mine.[/quote]

And you think that by the stats you gave away in the picture wouldnt be enough to find your character?

And the topic to post your character is here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,271213.0.html

Read full topic
